core/amp/category/styles:
<style amp-custom>
  {{> core/amp/css/base
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/header
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/footer
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
  {{> core/amp/css/category
    header_background=header_background
    header_text=header_text
    body_background=body_background
    color_headings=color_headings
    color_text=color_text
    footer_background=footer_background
    footer_text=footer_text
    color_accent=color_accent
    color_borders=color_borders
  }}
</style>
core/amp/category/subcategories:
{{#if category.subcategories}}
{{lang 'core.amp.subcategories'}}
    {{#each category.subcategories}}
  • {{name}}
    • {{/each}}
{{/if}}
core/amp/common/header:
{{#if banners.top}}
{{{limit banners.top 1}}}
{{/if}}
{{> core/amp/common/logo}}
{{#block 'amp-cart-icon'}}{{/block}}
{{> core/amp/common/navigation}}
core/amp/common/logo:
{{#if settings.store_logo.image}}
{{else}} {{settings.store_logo.title}} {{/if}}
core/amp/common/navigation:
{{#each categories}}
  • {{> core/amp/common/navigation-loop show_all=true }}
    • {{/each}}
    {{#each pages}}
  • {{> core/amp/common/navigation-loop show_all=false }}
    • {{/each}} {{#if settings.gift_certificates_enabled}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.gift_certificate'}}
    • {{/if}}
    {{#if currency_selector.currencies.length '>' 1}}
    {{lang 'core.amp.header.currency' code=currency_selector.active_currency_code}}
      {{#each currency_selector.currencies}}
    • {{name}}
      • {{/each}}
    {{/if}} {{#if settings.account_creation_enabled}} {{#if customer}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.account'}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.logout'}}
    • {{#if customer.store_credit.value '>' 0}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.store_credit' store_credit=customer.store_credit.formatted}}
    • {{/if}} {{else}}
  • {{lang 'core.amp.header.account'}}
    • {{/if}} {{/if}}
